summary: A highly driven and adaptable individual, seeking to challenge business strategy, formulate key actionable insights, and yield consistent results. I consider myself an experience-driven learner with aggressive growth goals, who looks to engage himself with relevant stakeholders and build agile & innovative process frameworks.

awards.title: Global Leaders Scholarship
awards.description: This Talent-Based Scholarship is awarded to meritorious candidates (admitted to the ESADE MSc Programmes) demonstrating strong leadership skills, a global and collaborative outlook and a curiosity to find impactful and sustainable solutions.

awards.title: Member of Students' Council 2018-19
awards.description:
Student Council is an organization conducted by students and supervised by adults.  The purpose of the student council is to give students an opportunity to develop leadership by organizing and carrying out school activities and service projects.  In addition to planning events that contribute to school spirit and community welfare, the student council is the voice of the student body.  They help share student ideas, interests and concerns with the school-wide community.
The function of the student council is based on parliamentary procedures.  Ideas are presented, voted upon and confirmed by the student body president.  Any student that is interested in leadership, organizational behaviour, event planning or becoming more involved in the school are welcome to become involved.

awards.title: Sr. Secretary Mathematics Association
awards.description: The Mathematics Association is responsible for organising events and informative sessions within the school premises. These include, but are not limited to, quizzes, industrial sessions and inter-school events. The role of the Secretary is to work alongside the President in preparing for and further improve the impact of such events.

- Personally handled accounting pertaining to sales and expenditure for the event.

All profits were distributed amongst the women.
